item.title: Trump backs Chagos handover deal, says No 10
item.description: It comes after the US president suggested last month he could withdraw his support for the deal.

item.title: Ruthless France thrash Irish in Six Nations opener
item.description: Ruthless France inflict more pain on Ireland as the Six Nations holders open their title defence with a bonus-point victory at a buoyant Stade de Fran...

item.title: Trump's nuclear arms control push with Russia hinges on China
item.description: As a treaty with Russia expires, the US president says he can get a better deal. Experts warn that could take years.

item.title: David Furnish and Sir Elton John 'profoundly affected' by Mail targeting, court told
item.description: The couple are among seven people suing the publisher of The Daily Mail and The Mail on Sunday for breaches of privacy.

item.title: Boy, 15, arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after teacher injured at school
item.description: Police were called to Milford Haven Comprehensive School in Pembrokeshire on Thursday afternoon.
